title: The Great Playground Leap!
description:
Sam, Darnell, and Violet are back from April vacation, and they all had a great break! But not as great as Brandon...


If you would like to support Stories Podcast, you can subscribe and give us a five star review on iTunes, head to patreon.com/stories and pledge to make a monthly donation, or just tell your friends about us! You can also check out this episode's sponsor, Mathnasium! Visit mathnasium.com/Stories or call 855-910-MATH for more information!


Now you can find new episodes of Stories, completely ad-free, on Stitcher Premium! For a free month of Stitcher Premium, go to stitcherpremium.com/wondery and use promo code 'WONDERY'.


Thank you!!
